text:
Am I thinking Europe might be nice for Amana~
There's plenty of shopping, sightseeing, and fun things to do~

Africa and South America were also wonderful...
Waking up in the great outdoors seems so refreshing

Hm? Oh, a travel guidebook...
Everywhere is great, but...

I want to go
to Africa

Seeing the Colosseum or the Eiffel Tower
in person... I'd like to do that

Yeah yeah! Amana feels the same way!
It's such a dream~

During the day, seeing giraffes, elephants, and lions on safari...
At night, looking up at the stars and drinking Kilimanjaro... It's a dream...

Producer, you must be tired...?
Please have a seat, I'll make some coffee for you

Oh...! Hehe...
Actually... I was thinking the same thing, Tenka...!

The potential of a home is...
infinite...!!
